transcript: there's a lot of parallels between bodybuilding and business the business needs to be balanced but your skill set doesn't need to be your whole body would be a business like what you are good at you should do more of right but your body has to be balanced so you actually start in Reverse so I train my weaknesses to strongest parts so that I'm freshest when I'm doing my things that I need the most work on and then I am most tired and fatigued on the stuff that I'm already really good at I flip that I do more volume on the stuff that I'm weakest at versus the stuff I'm strong at and I do it more frequently in the beginning you got to be decent at everything and that's why it's so hard but then once you get up a certain level of Leverage then it doesn't matter because then you can hire other people for your deficiencies
